pkgmetadata.longdescription: This is the latest incarnation of an emulator for the TI-99/4A. At first it was a simple text-based simulation of the TI (ti99sim-console) running under MS-DOS. Then it was ported to OS/2 and graphics support for the OS/2 Presentation Manager was added. Later, it was ported to Windows and had sound support added. Now it's been ported to Linux and Mac OS X and more features are still being added.

use.flag: Download the roms required for ti99sim.
